name: Power Sword
description:
“An evil warlock is attacking the Evergreen Kingdom for unknown reasons. Willing to kill many villagers, the warlock had created a dark portal inside a cave at the top of the Mount Parya, and it's up to you to get rid of the foul monsters that are spawning from the portal.” 

This is a very simple and short game I made in only a weekend. I had this idea from a Jam description I saw, where the challenge was to make a game with only 2 available buttons to play. I have merged this rule with other rules from the official RPG Maker forums, where there is a challenge where you can only use one map, 10 switches, 10 variables and 10 events.

You will only need to use the key and the key on your keyboard to play this game.

There is a scoring system, where you can print your hi score and post it online.

I hope you have fun playing it!

---

The cover image was made by Grégory Nunkovics, a real talented artist. You can find his homepage here:  https://www.artstation.com/twrch
